personal_information.name: Luis
personal_information.short_description: Experienced Engineering Manager and Solutions Architect with over 20 years in the IT industry, specialising in Cloud Architecture, Data Engineering, Machine Learning, and Artificial Intelligence. Proven track record in leading global projects, designing innovative solutions, and managing cross-functional teams.

estimate agentic solutions.

experience_details.position: Technology Development Associate (Solutions Architect / Technical Lead/Project Manager)
experience_details.company: DFS UNOPS Valencia (UNITED NATIONS OFFICE FOR PROJECTS AND SERVICES)
experience_details.short_description: Technical Leader and Subject Matter Expert in Software Development, Cloud Computing, and Artificial Intelligence, spearheading global projects and technology implementation at UNOPS.
key_responsibilities: Led global AI and Machine Learning projects, focusing on Computer Vision applications, and AI initiatives.
Architect solutions based on Kubernetes, Docker, etc. on Azure.
Pioneered Cloud and AI technology adoption, driving advancements in data analytics and cloud services.
Pioneered Edge devices implementation for areas where Cloud services were not available, and AI processing has to be done locally.
Leadership of Data scientist and Engineers.
Azure devops for CI/CD.
MLOPS WITH DVC for model and dataset tracing
Lead visualizations and insights display with PowerBI
Managed high-impact projects from ideation to service delivery, ensuring alignment with business needs.
Collaborated with the Cybersecurity Unit to implement endpoint security architecture and compliance policies.
Guided developer teams and coordinated with external stakeholders to ensure successful project outcomes.
Investigate Azure services like powerbi, power apps, and data analytics to improve data processing and analysis.
IED (Improvised exploding devices) threat mitigation and UAV (unmanned aerial vehicles) training and capacity development, including forensic investigation.
Experience in designing and implementing solutions for peacekeeping missions, including UAVs training, 3D mapping with drones for creating digital twins of peacekeeping missions.
projects: Designed and implemented an AI video surveillance system for peacekeeping missions. The project also included a lot of Architecture and Infrastructure design and study for using Edge devices for local processing.
Developed a NLP (language) system for detecting hate speech in social media, contributing to global UN efforts.
Led the implementation of Cloud Advanced Data Analytics in Azure, doing the EDA (exploratory data analysis), including predictive maintenance and RPA solutions.
Created and integrated a real-time tracking system for assets in peacekeeping missions into the Unite Aware Programme.
Capacity building, design and implementation of training for the projects implemented in coordination with training Unit
power automate apps for budget control, oil expenses approval, phone bills automation
UAVs training, 3D mapping with drones for creating digital twins of peacekeeping missions

experience_details.short_description: International consultant specialising in SharePoint development and data management systems, focusing on enhancing aviation safety through advanced technological solutions.
key_responsibilities: Developed and maintained SharePoint-based systems for aviation safety data management.
Integrated mobile data collection apps with backend systems for real-time safety assessments.
Provided consultancy on risk management and system integration for UN aviation operations.
projects: Developed a hybrid data collection system integrating mobile apps with SharePoint for aviation safety.
Provided consultancy on implementing risk management systems, improving UN aviation safety protocols.

achievements.name: AI-Driven Health Summary System
